Symbol.Script_3D:
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, sMat
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
! --- TRANSFORMATION --- !
XFORM MEP_Position[2][1], MEP_Position[3][1], dZx, MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[2][2], MEP_Position[3][2], dZy, MEP_Position[1][2], MEP_Position[2][3], MEP_Position[3][3], dZz, MEP_Position[1][3]
! --- FIRE HOUSE CABINET --- !
unID = 1 IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN ! Detailed
IF objType = 1 THEN ! Gate Valve Hose Connection HOTSPOT A-ConLength_1,0,0, unID: unID=unID+1
ROTy 90 CIRCLE ConWidth_1/2 IF 0.90*A-ConLength_1 > 0 THEN CYLIND 0.90*A-ConLength_1, 0.45*ConWidth_1 ENDIF ADDz 0.90*A-ConLength_1 CYLIND 0.1*A, 0.95*ConWidth_1/2 DEL 2
ADDx 0.30*ConWidth_1 ROTy -90 ARMC 0.45*ConWidth_1, 0.25*ConWidth_1, ZZYZX/2, 0,0,90
DEL 1 ADDz ZZYZX/2 RESOL 8 CYLIND 0.1*ZZYZX, 0.12*ConWidth_1 ADDz 0.1*ZZYZX RESOL 6 CYLIND 0.4*ZZYZX-ConWidth_1/2-0.005, 0.05*ConWidth_1 DEL 3
cx = SQR((B/2-0.005)^2 - (0.0025)^2) ADD 0.30*ConWidth_1,0,ZZYZX-ConWidth_1/2-0.005 RESOL res
ROTz 15 HOTSPOT 0,0, 0.005, unID: unID=unID+1 PRISM_ 18,0.005, 0,0,979, B/2,360,4079, -cx, 0.0025, 79, -0.0025,cx, 3079, -0.0025,0.0025, 15, -cx, 0.0025, -1, cx, 0.0025, 79, 0.0025,cx, 3079, 0.0025,0.0025, 15, cx, 0.0025, -1, -cx, -0.0025, 79, -0.0025,-cx, 3079, -0.0025,-0.0025, 15, -cx, -0.0025, -1, cx, -0.0025, 79, 0.0025,-cx, 3079, 0.0025,-0.0025, 15, cx, -0.0025, -1 DEL 2 ENDIF
IF objType = 2 THEN ! Globe Valve Hose Connection HOTSPOT A-ConLength_1,0,0, unID: unID=unID+1
ROTy 90 ! CIRCLE ConWidth_1/2 ADDz 0.90*A-ConLength_1 CYLIND 0.1*A, 0.95*ConWidth_1/2 DEL 2
R = 0.65*ConWidth_1 cxb = SQR(R^2 - (0.5*ConWidth_1)^2) cx = SQR(R^2 - (0.45*ConWidth_1)^2) cxt = SQR(R^2 - (0.25*ConWidth_1)^2)
ROTy -90 CUTPLANE DEL 1
ADDx cxb ADDx cx ROTy 90 IF 0.90*A-ConLength_1-cx-cxb > 0 THEN CYLIND 0.90*A-ConLength_1-cx-cxb, 0.45*ConWidth_1 ENDIF CUTPLANE DEL 2 ADDz cxt CUTPLANE DEL 1
ROTy 90 SPHERE R DEL 1
CUTEND CUTEND CUTEND DEL 1
ADDx cxb ADdz cxt IF 0.4*ZZYZX-cxt>EPS THEN CYLIND 0.4*ZZYZX-cxt,0.25*ConWidth_1 DEL 1
ADDz 0.4*ZZYZX RESOL 8 CYLIND 0.2*ZZYZX, 0.12*ConWidth_1 ADDz 0.2*ZZYZX RESOL 6 CYLIND 0.4*ZZYZX-ConWidth_1/2-0.005, 0.05*ConWidth_1 DEL 3
cx = SQR((B/2-0.005)^2 - (0.0025)^2) ADD cxb,0,ZZYZX-ConWidth_1/2-0.005 RESOL res
ROTz 15 HOTSPOT 0,0, 0.005, unID: unID=unID+1 PRISM_ 18,0.005, 0,0,979, B/2,360,4079, -cx, 0.0025, 79, -0.0025,cx, 3079, -0.0025,0.0025, 15, -cx, 0.0025, -1, cx, 0.0025, 79, 0.0025,cx, 3079, 0.0025,0.0025, 15, cx, 0.0025, -1, -cx, -0.0025, 79, -0.0025,-cx, 3079, -0.0025,-0.0025, 15, -cx, -0.0025, -1, cx, -0.0025, 79, 0.0025,-cx, 3079, 0.0025,-0.0025, 15, cx, -0.0025, -1 DEL 2 ENDIF ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN ! Simple IF objType = 1 THEN ! Gate Valve Hose Connection HOTSPOT A-ConLength_1,0,0, unID: unID=unID+1
ROTy 90 CIRCLE ConWidth_1/2 IF A-ConLength_1 > 0 THEN CYLIND A-ConLength_1, 0.45*ConWidth_1 ENDIF DEL 1
ADDx 0.30*ConWidth_1 ROTy -90 ARMC 0.45*ConWidth_1, 0.25*ConWidth_1, ZZYZX/2, 0,0,90
DEL 1 ADDz ZZYZX/2 RESOL 4 CYLIND 0.5*ZZYZX-ConWidth_1/2-0.005, 0.05*ConWidth_1 DEL 2
cx = SQR((B/2-0.005)^2 - (0.0025)^2) ADD 0.30*ConWidth_1,0,ZZYZX-ConWidth_1/2-0.005 RESOL res
ROTz 15 HOTSPOT 0,0, 0.005, unID: unID=unID+1 PRISM_ 18,0.005, 0,0,979, B/2,360,4079, -cx, 0.0025, 79, -0.0025,cx, 3079, -0.0025,0.0025, 15, -cx, 0.0025, -1, cx, 0.0025, 79, 0.0025,cx, 3079, 0.0025,0.0025, 15, cx, 0.0025, -1, -cx, -0.0025, 79, -0.0025,-cx, 3079, -0.0025,-0.0025, 15, -cx, -0.0025, -1, cx, -0.0025, 79, 0.0025,-cx, 3079, 0.0025,-0.0025, 15, cx, -0.0025, -1 DEL 2 ENDIF
IF objType = 2 THEN ! Globe Valve Hose Connection HOTSPOT A-ConLength_1,0,0, unID: unID=unID+1
ROTy 90 ADDz 0.90*A-ConLength_1 CYLIND 0.1*A, 0.95*ConWidth_1/2 DEL 2
R = 0.65*ConWidth_1 cxb = SQR(R^2 - (0.5*ConWidth_1)^2) cx = SQR(R^2 - (0.45*ConWidth_1)^2) cxt = SQR(R^2 - (0.25*ConWidth_1)^2)
ROTy -90 CUTPLANE DEL 1
ADDx cxb ADDx cx ROTy 90 IF 0.90*A-ConLength_1-cx-cxb > 0 THEN CYLIND 0.90*A-ConLength_1-cx-cxb, 0.45*ConWidth_1 ENDIF CUTPLANE DEL 2 ADDz cxt CUTPLANE DEL 1
RESOL 12 ROTy 90 SPHERE R DEL 1
CUTEND CUTEND CUTEND DEL 1
RESOL 6 ADDx cxb ADdz cxt CYLIND 0.4*ZZYZX-cxt,0.25*ConWidth_1 DEL 1
ADDz 0.4*ZZYZX RESOL 6 CYLIND 0.2*ZZYZX, 0.12*ConWidth_1 ADDz 0.2*ZZYZX RESOL 4 CYLIND 0.4*ZZYZX-ConWidth_1/2-0.005, 0.05*ConWidth_1 DEL 3
cx = SQR((B/2-0.005)^2 - (0.0025)^2) ADD cxb,0,ZZYZX-ConWidth_1/2-0.005 RESOL res
ROTz 15 HOTSPOT 0,0, 0.005, unID: unID=unID+1 PRISM_ 18,0.005, 0,0,979, B/2,360,4079, -cx, 0.0025, 79, -0.0025,cx, 3079, -0.0025,0.0025, 15, -cx, 0.0025, -1, cx, 0.0025, 79, 0.0025,cx, 3079, 0.0025,0.0025, 15, cx, 0.0025, -1, -cx, -0.0025, 79, -0.0025,-cx, 3079, -0.0025,-0.0025, 15, -cx, -0.0025, -1, cx, -0.0025, 79, 0.0025,-cx, 3079, 0.0025,-0.0025, 15, cx, -0.0025, -1 DEL 2 ENDIF ENDIF
RESOL res
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 1
DEL TOP
END
Symbol.Script_2D:
CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds = 30000
hceID_1 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+100
unID = 1 IF ABS(dZz-1) < EPS THEN ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2] ROT2 dirAngOnXYPlane
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A-ConLength_1, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
IF objType = 1 THEN ! Gate Valve Hose Connection
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, A-ConLength_1, 0.475*ConWidth_1, 1, 0.9*A-ConLength_1, 0.475*ConWidth_1, 1, 0.9*A-ConLength_1, -0.475*ConWidth_1, 1, A-ConLength_1, -0.475*ConWidth_1, 1
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0.9*A-ConLength_1, 0.45*ConWidth_1, 1, 0, 0.45*ConWidth_1, 1, 0, -0.45*ConWidth_1, 1, 0.9*A-ConLength_1, -0.45*ConWidth_1, 1
cx = SQR((B/2-0.005)^2 - (0.0025)^2)
ADD2 0.30*ConWidth_1,0 ROT2 0 POLY2_B 18, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,901, B/2,360,4001, -cx, 0.0025, 1, -0.0025,cx, 3001, -0.0025,0.0025, 1, -cx, 0.0025, -1, cx, 0.0025, 1, 0.0025,cx, 3001, 0.0025,0.0025, 1, cx, 0.0025, -1, -cx, -0.0025, 1, -0.0025,-cx, 3001, -0.0025,-0.0025, 1, -cx, -0.0025, -1, cx, -0.0025, 1, 0.0025,-cx, 3001, 0.0025,-0.0025, 1, cx, -0.0025, -1 DRAWINDEX 10 DEL 2 ENDIF
IF objType = 2 THEN ! Globe Valve Hose Connection
R = 0.65*ConWidth_1 cxb = SQR(R^2 - (0.5*ConWidth_1)^2) cx = SQR(R^2 - (0.45*ConWidth_1)^2)
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, A-ConLength_1, 0.475*ConWidth_1, 1, 0.9*A-ConLength_1, 0.475*ConWidth_1, 1, 0.9*A-ConLength_1, -0.475*ConWidth_1, 1, A-ConLength_1, -0.475*ConWidth_1, 1
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0.9*A-ConLength_1, 0.45*ConWidth_1, 1, cxb+cx, 0.45*ConWidth_1, 1, cxb+cx, -0.45*ConWidth_1, 1, 0.9*A-ConLength_1, -0.45*ConWidth_1, 1 POLY2_B 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, cxb, 0, 901, 0, ConWidth_1/2, 1, cxb+cx, 0.45*ConWidth_1, 3001, cxb+cx, -0.45*ConWidth_1, 1, 0, -ConWidth_1/2, 3001
cx = SQR((B/2-0.005)^2 - (0.0025)^2)
ADD2 cxb,0 ROT2 0 POLY2_B 18, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,901, B/2,360,4001, -cx, 0.0025, 1, -0.0025,cx, 3001, -0.0025,0.0025, 1, -cx, 0.0025, -1, cx, 0.0025, 1, 0.0025,cx, 3001, 0.0025,0.0025, 1, cx, 0.0025, -1, -cx, -0.0025, 1, -0.0025,-cx, 3001, -0.0025,-0.0025, 1, -cx, -0.0025, -1, cx, -0.0025, 1, 0.0025,-cx, 3001, 0.0025,-0.0025, 1, cx, -0.0025, -1 DRAWINDEX 10 DEL 2 ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = 1, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1 = ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 1 DEL 2 ELSE HOTSPOT2 outCoords[1][1], outCoords[1][2], hceID_1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[4][1], outCoords[4][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[5][1], outCoords[5][2], unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 outCoords[6][1], outCoords[6][2], unID: unID=unID+1
SET FILL gs_fill_type
PEN gs_cont_pen IF gs_fill_pen THEN PEN gs_fill_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 4, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 PEN gs_cont_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ENDIF
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS = 0.0001
DIM type_dim[2] type_dim[1]=`Задвижка` type_dim[2]=`Проходной Запорный Вентиль`
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "objTypeStr" THEN IF objTypeStr = type_dim[1] THEN objType = 1 IF objTypeStr = type_dim[2] THEN objType = 2 PARAMETERS objType = objType ENDIF
IF objTypeStr <> type_dim[objType] THEN objTypeStr = type_dim[objType] PARAMETERS objTypeStr = objTypeStr ENDIF
! ---------------- ! ! --- Z vector --- ! ! ---------------- !
dZx = -MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][3]+MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][2] dZy = -MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][1]+MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][3] dZz = -MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][2]+MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][1]
! --- dirAngOnXYPlane of the route --- !
IF ABS(dZz-1) < EPS THEN arCosVal = MEP_Position[3][1]/1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = -1 THEN arCosVal = -1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = 1 THEN arCosVal = 1 dirAngOnXYPlane = ACS(arCosVal)-90 IF SGN(MEP_Position[3][2]) = -1 THEN dirAngOnXYPlane = 180-dirAngOnXYPlane ENDIF
!!! +++ Transformational Matrix +++ !!!
DIM tMatrix[3][3]
tMatrix[1][1] = MEP_Position[2][1] tMatrix[1][2] = MEP_Position[2][2] tMatrix[1][3] = MEP_Position[2][3]
tMatrix[2][1] = MEP_Position[3][1] tMatrix[2][2] = MEP_Position[3][2] tMatrix[2][3] = MEP_Position[3][3]
tMatrix[3][1] = dZx tMatrix[3][2] = dZy tMatrix[3][3] = dZz
!!! +++ Input Coordinates +++ !!!
PUT ConPosX_1+gs_Connections[1][4]*ConLength_1, ConPosY_1+gs_Connections[1][5]*ConLength_1, ConPosZ_1+gs_Connections[1][6]*ConLength_1 PUT gs_Connections[1][4], gs_Connections[1][5], gs_Connections[1][6] PUT gs_Connections[1][7], gs_Connections[1][8], gs_Connections[1][9]
PUT 0, 0, 0 PUT A-ConLength_1, 0, 0 PUT -ConLength_1, 0, 0
Coordinates = NSP/3
DIM inCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates inCoords[cnum][1] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][2] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][3] = GET(1) NEXT cnum
! --- the Matrix Operation, what make the Output-Coordinates
DIM outCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates outCoords[cnum][1] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][1]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][1]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][1]+MEP_Position[1][1] outCoords[cnum][2] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][2]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][2]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][2]+MEP_Position[1][2] outCoords[cnum][3] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][3]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][3]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][3]+MEP_Position[1][3] NEXT cnum
z = MEP_Position[1][3]
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_attr[5][4] FOR i = 1 TO 5 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 3 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 6 ui_vis_attr[1][4] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[1] ui_con_type[1] = 0
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 0 ENDIF
IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 0 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2
Symbol.Script_VL:
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN LOCK "MainBoxMaterial" IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN LOCK "useSysMat"
! --- OBJECT SPECIFIC PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF objType = 1 THEN ! Gate Valve Hose Connection VALUES "A" RANGE [0.90*ConWidth_1,] ENDIF IF objType = 2 THEN ! Globe Valve Hose Connection VALUES "A" RANGE [1.2*ConWidth_1,] ENDIF VALUES "B" RANGE [ConWidth_1,] VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [1.3*ConWidth_1+0.01,] ENDIF
VALUES "objType" 1, 2 VALUES "objTypeStr" type_dim
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 1
! --- THE ONLY CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Соединение Конца Трубы`
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, ) PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConWidth_1
PARAMETERS ConPosX_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = 0 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
FOR k = 1 TO MEP_NumberConnections FOR i = 1 TO 9 j = 1+INT((i-0.5)/3) MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = outCoords[j+3*(k-1)][i-3*(j-1)] PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] NEXT i NEXT k
Symbol.Comment: соединение для шлангов, с затвором или проходным запорным вентилем и со сварным или фланцевым соединением.
